name: European Printing Ink Association
membership: EuPIA is a sector of CEPE, the European Association of the Paint, Printing Ink, and Artists' Colours Industries, see www.cepe.org
memberOrga: see list of members at www.eupia.org
goal: EuPIA represents the interests of the printing inks and varnishes Industry in Europe. Operating under umbrella of CEPE, it represents more than 75 companies generating About 90% of ink Sales in Europe. 90% of EuPIA's members are SMEs.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: EuPIA closely follows all activities in the field of food contact materials legislation, circular economy, and any health, safety and environment legislation affecting the printing ink and allied industries
